page.title: 02LANDSCAPE FERNDOWN GENERAL
page.content: Road and pavement surfaces are often being worked on since the town centre undergoes frequent improvements. {Housing}ranges from small bungalows to large houses. Standards of housing are high and there are no high-rise blocks of flats. Many different types of housing are going to be completed during the next decade - in the region of 500-1000. There is strong competition between shops and many of similar type, eg. four large supermarkets and several hair salons, are contained in a small area.{Tesco,}owners of the most recent addition to Ferndown's supermarkets, have given Â£1/2 million towards the new community centre, which is being built as part of the new town centre development. There are good{public services including Fire, Police and Library.
